Model Actions

Restart

Stop and restart this model. This will render your model unreachable for a moment.

Sleep

Sleeping a model will remove a model from active memory. Use this to save RAM when you have many models on a single server.

Wake

Bring this model out of sleep mode in order to make predictions.

Delete

Fully delete this model from the ScienceOps system. Warning: deletion is not reversible.

Shared Users

Manage Collaborators

Allow other users to view and call your model via the ScienceOps API.
